about_the_game:
“Infinite Miner” has two elements. First is Rogue-like. Destroy a large number of asteroids with a spaceship, collect resources, level up, strengthen weapons, and defeat enemies repeatedly to clear the stage. Second is Hack and slash. After clearing a stage, player can use the points earned to strengthen their equipment and clear the next stage. You can experience the exhilaration of defeating a large number of enemies and powerup weapons.

Key Features


Reroll equipment for power up in between stages

　Reroll equipment using points collected during stage play. Repeatedly reroll to create your own equipment to Aim to clear the next stage. If you want to attack a large area, repeat the whole reroll until you have multiple mods for range expansion, then reroll only the value of the mod. It is a fun way to reflect one's individuality in one's equipment.
　The maximum value of mods is increased by craft level. The crafting level is increased by the resources spent on rerolling, so the more you reroll, the better equipment you will get. This is why it is “Infinite”.

Overwhelming volume of enemies
　As in some balloon game, when a higher level rock is destroyed, a lower level rock appears. That lower level rock will cause even lower level rocks to appear. ...... Anyway, destroy a lot of enemies!
